name: Hunt Slonem
describe: Inspired by nature and his 60 pet birds, Hunt Slonem is renowned for his distinct neo-expressionist style.

name: Tim Hayward
describe: Tim Hayward has developed a highly individual and imaginative form of wildlife painting. His subtlety in rendering textures in watercolour and gouache, and accuracy of line and form demonstrate a lifetime's study of and fascination with wildlife.

name: Doves and Swallow - Roseate
describe: Gallery curates a series of original etchings from respected European artist and ex-New Yorker, Cuca Romley. Ms Romley is in her eighties, and currently based in Spain after spending decades in New York City.

name: Etching - Central Park West
describe: Inspired by nature and his 60 pet birds, Hunt Slonem is renowned for his distinct neo-expressionist style.

name: Sleepwalk
describe: The Juxtapose by french contemporary artist Mr. Brainwash was created in 2020 in his signature style of layering paint, stencil, and mixed media on paper to create a cultural commentary in vibrant visual format.

name: Mr. Brainwash, Juxtapose (Unique Painting), 2020
describe: Fragmentation is a unique contemporary modern painting by renowned Polish-Dutch artist Eliza Kopec. The painting is a typical example of her preferred minimalist abstract geometric vocabulary.

name: Fragmentation
describe: The work is signed in the lower right. The artwork is registered in the archives of the Calder Foundation, New York, under the application number A12826.

name: The Traveler by Jessica Pisano
describe: This stunning British Victorian oil painting is by noted topographical artist William Parrott. Painted in 1847 whilst Parrott was living in Italy, the location is the Piazza del Nettuno in Bologne.

name: Eclat
describe: December 1961—Madame Jean Serpieri sits in the ballroom of the Tour La Reine near Athens, wearing a gown which belonged to the wife of Otto, the first king of modern Greece.

name: An Imaginary Landscape
describe: This highly detailed oil on panel by French artist François Brunery offers a rich and exuberant glimpse into the life of a clergyman.

name: Street Scene in Bologna

name: Unexpected scandals
describe: Knaut builds her compositions slowly over time, adding layers of colours and materials then scraping them away, working them over and over. Gestural markings intermingle with bits of images taken from life, which are then rubbed away.

name: Covers 1&2
describe: Beautiful oil on canvas painting by the French artist, Henri Alexis Schaeffer. This painting is a wonderful example of his work from the prime of his career.

name: Unexpected scandals
describe: Beautiful oil on canvas painting by the French artist, Henri Alexis Schaeffer. This painting is a wonderful example of his work from the prime of his career.

name: Dashing into the day
describe: Beautiful oil on canvas painting by the French artist, Henri Alexis Schaeffer. This painting is a wonderful example of his work from the prime of his career.

describe: Beautiful oil on canvas painting by the French artist, Henri Alexis Schaeffer. This painting is a wonderful example of his work from the prime of his career.

name: Parisian Street Corner at Dusk 1961
describe: The ‘Mantra’ is a silkscreen print with diamond dust, created by Master Contemporary artist, Damien Hirst in 2011. This massive, stately, and shimmering print is the largest ever created by Hirst in his entire career to date.

describe: The ‘Mantra’ is a silkscreen print with diamond dust, created by Master Contemporary artist, Damien Hirst in 2011. This massive, stately, and shimmering print is the largest ever created by Hirst in his entire career to date.

name: Amaia Swivel Chair
describe: Made for modern minimalists, this upholstered swivel chair is made from a slub weave with textural appeal, capturing a pared-back silhouette with a curving back that wraps around and lovely.

name: Brenna Convertible Sofa
describe: Only at Urban Outfitters, this faux leather sofa converts to a bed when your friends are crashing for the night. With allover tufting and cushioned build, sofa folds down to convention.

name: Caroline Chaise Lounge
describe: Channeling a classic, vintage look, this chaise lounge lends an invitingly refined touch to your space. Topped with a striped material, this all-over upholstered construction feat applies to everyhouse.

name: Caroline Dining Chair
describe: Classic, folk-inspired dining chair with a wooden frame and woven paneling at seat and back. Assembly required. Exclusive to Urban Outfitters.

name: Cooper Faux Sheepskin Lounge Chair
describe: Instantly cozify your space with this overstuffed lounge chair upholstered in fluffy faux sheepskin. In a soft, frameless shape you can always depend on for flopping and you will feel very comfortable.

name: Floria Velvet Chair
describe: Upholstered allover in rich velvet, this arm chair lends a luxurious interpretation of modernist silhouettes to your space. The Tri-leg chair features cushions at seat and back, set on a living room.

name: Foster Chair
describe: Pull up a seat of sleek style with this polished arm chair. Upholstered with striped cushions at seat + back, framed in metal with a slim take on industrial design signatures.

name: Industrial Stool
describe: Inspired by ornate vintage designs, this printed rug features a bordered pattern.

name: Joaquin Faux Leather ArmChair
describe: Mid-century modern arm chair crafted from sleek faux leather fitted with carved walnut wood. The ultra-versatile minimalist design works in any space, especially when paired.

name: Maggie Faux Fur Shag Chair
describe: Cuddle up in this fuzzy faux fur chair that adds a chic vibe to any space. In a rounded, legless design with tapered arms, vertical seaming + extra-soft padding for a spot that you can fellowship with enthusiasm.

name: Meara Dining Chair
describe: Minimalist-industrial lounge chair featuring a sleek, tubular metal frame with cushioned seat base + back.

name: Mid-Century Dining Chair
describe: Boho-inspired patchwork leather ottoman, cut round in a drum silhouette with sewn panels in a soft, cushioned design. This custom furniture piece will be made to order just in time for your room.

name: Mesa Patchwork Leather Ottoman
describe: Our Mid-Century Dining Chair is retro-inspired comfort that's built to last. Its wide, cushy seat and sloping back offer an inviting seat no matter how long the meal and its control.

name: Miriam Hanging Chair
describe: The most relaxing nook for reading a book or enjoying a sway, this hanging chair is made from curving strands of rattan, offering concentric details framing a basket woven seat.

name: Rattan Armchair
describe: Bring vintage-inspired charm to your space with this rattan arm chair, featuring a wraparound back and arching structure with woven panels.

name: Reema Back Cushion
describe: Soft, comfy back cushion for extra support in any space - on a bed, against a wall or with a floor cushion. Pairs perfectly with our Reema Floor Cushion (sold separately).

name: Robyn Dining Chair
describe: Bring mid-century mod lines to your space with this angular, cutout dining chair. Made with a polyester-upholstered seat and wooden tapered legs, featuring light cushioning, armrests.,,

name: Rohini Daybed Cushion
describe: Soft and cozy overstuffed cushion with tufted accents we love. Pair with any of our daybeds (sold separately), use it to top off a bench or get a few and stack them for a comfy area.

name: Rosa Velvet Dining Chair
describe: UO-exclusive velvet dining chair in soft, luxe velvet with a modern armless shape we love. Trimmed with straight, lacquered legs to complete the look, place it around your table.

name: Schoolhouse Chair
describe: Mid Century-style natural oak wood chair with a faux leather-wrapped seat that's like the perfect vintage find without all that searching. Use it to accent any room, pair it with a desk for students.

name: Selena Armchair
describe: Upholstered arm chair with tufted seaming for a Parisian-femme look we love. Cozy chair features a cushioned seat with upholstered back + arms, set on four wooden legs in natural furniture.

name: Sonora Chair
describe: Rustic modernism lends an elevated look to your space with this standout chair featuring an acacia wood frame and leather upholstery topping the rounded, conical construction. This custom fits with every room in your house.

name: Wesley Faux Leather Lounge Chair
describe: Modern minimalism looks so good with this faux leather lounge chair. Equipped with a tubular metal frame and cushioning at faux leather-upholstered seat and back.

name: Wesley Lounge Chair
describe: Minimalist-industrial lounge chair featuring a sleek, tubular metal frame with cushioned seat base + back. Offers a sloped pitch for a comfortably polished place to rest.

name: Winslow Armless Sleeper Sofa
describe: Comfy tufted armless sofa in a modern textured upholstery we love, set on a durable wood frame with minimal cylindrical wood legs. Perfectly versatile for any size space, any room.

name: Anderson Printed Rug
describe: Inspired by ornate vintage designs, this printed rug features a bordered pattern. Printed onto a low tufted design with rich colors.

name: Bina Printed Chenille Rug
describe: Inspired by ornate vintage designs, this printed rug features a bordered pattern. Printed onto a low tufted design with rich colors.

name: Clayton Woven Rug
describe: Geo-woven rug with a low profile and textural design that lends tonal dimension to your space. Featuring bobble and chevron textures in a linear design, flanked in fringed trim at edge.

name: Coast Printed Rug
describe: Low-profile printed rug offering the look of a well-worn vintage rug with an ornate central, placed design featuring bordered edges.

name: Crystal Floral Tufted Rug
describe: Power-loomed in a rich, multi-color floral design inspired by vintage, but given a modern update, this rug comes in a soft but durable tufted finish that’ll last for years to catch out.

name: Everly Printed Rug
describe: Brushed texture rug with a low-profile woven construction that features all over blocks of abstract color to add a modern pop to your space.

name: Ginger Woven Rug
describe: Saturated with rich, warm hues, this patterned rug features a traditional look on a cushioned, low-profile weave. Bordered design with non-slip backing.

name: Hayes Printed Rug
describe: Woven with a low-profile weave, this rug features a classic design with an intricate, central print. Featuring a bordered edge and worn-in look.

name: Isla Rag Rug
describe: Modern-boho rag rug featuring abstract color blocking offering a naturalistic feel that’s so fresh, trimmed with fringed edges.

name: Jumbo Dot Printed Rug
describe: Bring a modernist pattern to your space with this oversized dot print rug, made in a soft brushed texture with bordered striping at side edges. Low-profile design trimmed with fingers.

name: Blakeney For Loloi Quinn Printed Rug
describe: Low-profile woven rug designed by Justina Blakeney for Loloi with an elaborate print inspired by the techniques used to create vintage, hand-woven designs.

name: Blakeney For Loloi Selby Tufted Rug
describe: Tufted rug featuring an ornate medallion print blooming from the center, designed by Justina Blakeney for Loloi. Cushy, plush printed rug with raw, frayed edge.

name: Keegan Printed Jute Rug
describe: Infuse your space with a graphic take on boho signatures with this printed jute rug. Featuring an allover geo pattern and low-profile, tight-woven construction.

name: Layna Medallion Tufted Rug
describe: Grounded geometric motifs and rich hues adorn this bold bohemian rug. Low-profile tufted construction lends texture to the central, bordered design.

name: Marco Trellis Rug
describe: Trellis-patterned rug with a bordered edge, offering a boho-geo look with a vintage-inspired palette we love. Low-profile, power-loomed construction.

name: Nico Rainbow Shag Rug
describe: Hand-tufted in a stunning mix of colors and textures, this wool rug features cozy 1 pile shag and mini woven rainbows for a cheerful finish. Trimmed with tasseled fringe to complete your house.

name: Rachel Tufted Rug
describe: Cushy tufted rug with linear geometric print starting at sides and working into the middle. Made in Turkey with a high, 1.2” pile and braided tassel trim at edges.

name: Reese Printed Rug
describe: Offering an ornate, vintage-inspired look with a distressed finish, this luxe printed rug features a bordered edge and intricate design, made with a modern construction that holds up.

name: Round Jute Rug
describe: Round jute rug featuring an overdyed treatment for rich pigment that offers a bold hit of contrast to any space. Spiraled, braided construction provides a tight-coiled look, made entirely.

name: Samantha Medallion Tufted Rug
describe: Bring classic bohemian design to your space with this polyester tufted rug, featuring a low-profile construction highlighting a medallion pattern in colorful hues.

name: Super Berber Rug
describe: Better-than-basic Berber-inspired rug woven from fuzzy but durable wool yarn. Trimmed with natural fringe at the sides to complete the look.

name: Suri Reversible Indoor Outdoor Rug
describe: Bring a Deco look to your patio or entryway space with this reversible chevron-patterned rug made from durable recycled plastic, perfect for high-traffic areas.

name: Tessa Hilo Tufted Rug
describe: Minimalist geometrics are embellished with tufted texture in this low-profile rug featuring plus signs dotted all over. Trimmed with fringed edges.

name: Plus Rug
describe: Saturated with rich, warm hues, this patterned rug features a traditional look on a cushioned, low-profile weave.

name: Concrete Side Table
describe: Industrial side table crafted from solid concrete. Simple design that's perfect for a modern piece in any living, dining or sleeping space.

name: Birdy Side Table
describe: Tweet tweet! Side table with bird leg-inspired footing for a totally unique addition to any living space. Circular top provides plenty of surface area for you to use it as a side table in a living space or even as a nightstand! Essential piece of statement furniture for any apartment.

name: Triangle Side Table
describe: Lend a modern, new angle to your living space with this triangular metal side table in multiple pop color finishes to choose from. Light weight and efficiently sized for small spaces with structural legs for a subtle industrial vibe.

name: Adam Outdoor Dining Table
describe: Perfect for basking in sunny days, this outdoor dining table features a metal structure. With gridded glass tabletop and wheels at base.

name: Pierce Wicker Side Table
describe: Woven rattan side table, available exclusively at UO. The perfect boho accent piece, this side table offers a rounded construction with an hourglass design + pinched base.

name: Metal Folding Side Table
describe: A super versatile, perfectly modern addition to your space, this UO-exclusive metal side table comes in a powder-coated metal finish and folds up to store away. Constructed with a round tray top with raised edges that sits on a folding x-frame base that folds up when you need some extra space.

name: Mila Round Dining Table
describe: Perfect for small spaces, this sleek dining table features a mid-century modern look. Round tabletop rests on tapered metal legs that angle out. Assembly required.

name: Mae Bean Side Table
describe: Evoking minimalist mid-century style, this bean-shaped side table is UO-exclusive and so sleek. With a curvy, bean-shaped tabletop set on a trio of tapered legs and constructed from a natural-finish mango wood.

name: Modular Triangle Side Tabl
describe: Crafted from durable mango wood in India, this triangular side table is the perfect little piece for accenting any room with modern vibes. Sleek little side table comes in a range of finishes, complete with a trio of rounded legs. Grab one or a few to display together! Exclusive to Urban Outfitters.

name: Florence Console Table
describe: Slim metal console, perfect for making the most of your space with a minimalist-industrial look. Equipped with a metal frame and manufactured wood tabletop. 2 people recommended for assembly.

name: Mid-Century Fold Out Desk
describe: Essential fold-out desk to optimize storage and work space in any apartment or small living area. Solid, durable design constructed from a natural finish mango wood that folds out when you need it and tucks away when you don't. Features secret storage compartments that lift to reveal plenty of room for pencils, paper and more. Modern and rustic touch to any living space.

name: Marisol Rattan Desk
describe: Channeling vintage-inspired aesthetics, this rattan desk features an arching frame with rounded edges and dual drawers with bar pulls along upper edge. Features an allover basket woven construction.

name: Female Form Indoor/Outdoor Side Table
describe: Cylindrical ceramic side table decorated with an artful rendering of the female form. In a round silhouette with a flat tabletop. For adding an intimate touch to your indoor space or making your outdoor seating area so special. Available exclusively at Urban Outfitters.

name: Ceramic Drum Indoor/Outdoor Side Table
describe: Speckled ceramic side table with a painted design for a modernist look that gives your space an artful touch. Cylindrical build features a flat tabletop for displaying candles, treasures and plants. For adding a touch of color to your indoor space or making your outdoor seating area so special. This special ceramic piece is handmade and may vary slightly in size and appearance. Available exclusively at UO.

name: Florence Desk
describe: Industrial-modern desk featuring manufactured wood tabletop + open shelves at either side. Framed in metal with plenty of options for display + storage opportunities.

name: Metal Tubing Desk
describe: Sleek metal desk with a stylish minimalist flair - made exclusively for UO!

name: Bandera Side Table
describe: A chic take on a graphic look, this side table features a rounded shaped base in a high-contrast painted stripe with a mango wood tabletop, available exclusively at UO. This custom furniture piece will be made to order just for you. 2 people recommended for assembly.

name: Amira Carved Wood Nightstand
describe: Beautifully boho nightstand crafted from natural Mango wood in a distressed finish we love. Perfect as a nightstand or side table in any space!

name: Wesley Console Table
describe: Display console table featuring a metal frame with a super-sleek silhouette. Made with a trio of tiers, all with rounded edges and glass panes for storage + display. We love it for showcasing our favorite books, art pieces and speakers. Assembly required.

name: Miles Redd Collection Telephone Table
describe: Handmade high gloss lacquer with bronze hardware

name: Karl Springer Mirror Stainless Steel Table
describe: A rare table by Karl Springer. Stainless steel frame with brass corners, the top is done in an exotic wood with incredible grain pattern. Superb quality.

name: Abbott Tiered Side Table, Basalt
describe: Casa Cosima presents an exclusive collection of haute bohemian furnishings inspired by the lush, layered interiors of international tastemakers’ private estancias, chateaux and palazzi.

name: Michel Dumas Table With Smoked Glass Top
describe: An amethyst/bronze hued lucite coffee table designed by Michel Dumas for Roche Bobois, 1970s. Featuring a lucite base and a smoked glass top that slides into the two floating bases.

name: Annette Entry Console, Van Duesen Blue
describe: This is a made to order item with a 6-8 week leadtime. The color is Benjamin Moore Van Deusen Blue.A handy hall table with a curious triangular top that rests over shaped apron rails supported by tapered chamfered posts.

name: Contemporary Hand Chiseled Black Accent or Side Table
describe: All sides of this round side table is hand chiseled and the top of this organic accent table is hand cut and and polished. A pair black chiseled modern wood accent table is available and can be used as a set of small coffee table.

name: Bellevue Floor Mirror
describe: Maximize your space with this oversized floor mirror, minimally trimmed with gold-brushed stainless steel. Backed with durable solid poplar wood, rest it vertically on the floor for a full-length closet companion or horizontally on any surface for a DIY vanity space!

name: Oversized Hub Mirror
describe: Oversized glass mirror with a black rubber trim designed by Paul Rowan. We love this piece to make smaller living spaces appear larger. Statement piece on its own in any room.

name: Ria Leaning Rattan Mirror
describe: Low-key + so boho, this leaning full-length mirror is part of our UO-exclusive Ria collection. Leaning mirror features 5 rungs for hanging essentials, made from bound rattan with rounded edges. Assembly required.

name: Leni Leaning Mirror
describe: Multi-functional leaning mirror. Frame features full-length mirror + hooks for hanging and an additional bar for jewelry, scarves or other accessories. Non-slip footing so you can lean it against a wall in any living space.

name: Metallic Hub Wall Mirror
describe: Oversized mirror with a gleaming trim for a polished, modernist feel. Pop it on any wall to make even the smallest spaces feel so much bigger. The perfect statement piece on its own in any room.

name: Pipe Standing Mirror
describe: Industrial pipe standing full-length mirror. Eclectic + sleek design perfect for any living space. UO Exclusive.

name: Simple Wood Mirror
describe: Full-length mirror with simple oak wood framing. Prop it against a wall or hang it vertically or horizontally (hardware not included). Looks great in any space!

name: Liza Tapered Mirror
describe: Full-length leaning mirror with non-slip footing for any living space. Features small shelf at the base of the mirror for little trinkets + treasures. Slim design fits anywhere for a unique + functional feature piece.

name: Ashton Mango Wood Mirror
describe: Full-length mirror framed in natural mango wood - only available right here at Urban Outfitters. In a sturdy, oversized construction for setting right on the floor. Due to variations in the natural materials, the wood hue and grain may vary slightly from what's pictured here.

name: Magical Thinking Woven Wall Mirror
describe: Wall mirror nestled inside a woven wood frame from Magical Thinking - choose your favorite or grab all three for a coordinated, boho look we love. A unique touch of rustic charm for any space. Pre-attached fixtures for easy hanging. UO Exclusive.

name: Emelie Floor Mirror
describe: Catch every angle when you get ready in front of this boho-modern floor mirror featuring a leaning frame made from eucalyptus wood with rounded corners along the upper edge. Available exclusively at us.

name: Huxley Mirror
describe: Rubberwood standing full-length mirror from our Huxley collection. Dowel frame leans against the wall with a slim profile that fits into your space wherever you want to catch a second look. Assembly required.

name: Triangle Mirror Set
describe: Set of 3 triangular mirrors framed in brass. Complete with chains + loops for hanging. Hang them together or separately for a custom look in any living, dining or sleeping space! Hardware not included. UO Exclusive.

name: Akina Floor Mirror
describe: Modern shapes meet a naturalistic finish with this full-length, leaning floor mirror. Standing design made from acacia wood with two legs and angular construction.

name: Kyrie Wall Mirror
describe: Arching wall mirror featuring a hammered metal frame in a gleaming finish to add a polished look to your wall display. Available exclusively at us.

name: Blob Wall Mirror
describe: Freshen up your space with abstract shaping and a minimalist aesthetic when you catch your reflection in this frameless wall mirror. Exclusive to Urban Outfitters.

name: Bi-Fold Mirror
describe: Sleek bi-fold mirror with hinged center to stand tabletop, complete with slim rounded corners and metal edges.

name: Kayla Wall Mirror
describe: Diamond-shaped wall mirror featuring a slim, shiny frame that offers a sleek take on Deco-inspired motifs.

name: Luna Wall Mirror
describe: Hang the moon with this round wall mirror, featuring hammered metal framing with a crescent panel arching along the side.

name: Layla Mirror
describe: Get ready with a sleek view when you gaze into this elegant tabletop mirror featuring a slim metal frame with a gleaming sheen. Round articulated mirror sits in a standing frame with a curving base. Available exclusively at us.

name: Carson Leather Strap Mirror
describe: A refined take on an industrial look, this polished round mirror features a sturdy faux leather strap for hanging. Round mirror with a gleaming metal frame and bolted strap.

name: Safi Floor Mirror
describe: Abstract leaning floor mirror with a curving shape that nestles into a pine wood sphere at base. Oversized mirror opens up your space with a boldly minimal look. Mounts to wall. UO exclusive.

name: Cubiko Storage Mirror
describe: The Cubiko Storage Mirror is a minimalist’s dream with 3 built-in shelves cleverly hidden behind a bathroom mirror. Delicately framed in blackened steel, use it to stow all your bath + beauty products out of plain sight. Hanging hardware included for easy installation.

name: Yvette LED Floor Mirror
describe: Illuminate your space with an ethereal glow when you lean this arched mirror against the wall and bask in its light. Full-length mirror with rounded top edge makes your getting ready routine so glam with backlighting emitted from the upper curve.

name: Smoko Potato Light
describe: Set the mood for a cozy day in with this potato light by Smoko. Emits a soft glow with a trio of brightness levels and touch sensor operation. Rechargeable via USB.

name: Saturn Light Sculpture
describe: Cosmic light sculpture for a space that’s all your own. Made from bent gold wire wrapped with twinkly firefly lights. Easy to hang on any wall with an attached battery pack! UO exclusive.

name: Daisy Light Sculpture
describe: Daisy-shaped wall sculpture wrapped with twinkly firefly lights for a touch of flower power in any space! In bent gold-tone wire with a translucent battery pack attached so you can hang it on a wall, lean it up against a dresser or bring it just about anywhere.

name: Brookstone Vanity Light
describe: Curate a luxe getting-ready space inspired by Old Hollywood with this vanity strip light by Brookstone. Designed to mount to the wall with suction cups or hardware backing, featuring four exposed bulbs and remote-controlled operation. Battery-powered.

name: Globe Pendant Light
describe: Sleek and elegant, this globe pendant light features a simple, spherical glass shade topped with a slim hanging bar in an antiqued brass finish. Hardwired.

name: Mirror Bar Light
describe: Illuminate your getting-ready space with this touch-activated bar light. Featuring suction cups at back for adhering to your mirror and providing a bright beam to help light your way to the perfect visage. Battery powered.

name: Smoko Dumpling Sauna Light
describe: Relax like this little dumpling steaming in a sauna in this ultra-cute light by Smoko. Equipped with a trio of brightness levels and touch sensor on/off operation. Rechargeable via USB cable.

name: Rattan Pendant Light
describe: A modern interpretation of a vintage-fave material, this rattan pendant light offers a lacquered finish along the disc-shaped construction. Hardwired, you can adjust the hanging length to perfectly suit your space.

name: Macramé Pendant Light
describe: Top your space with a boho mood when you hang this macramé pendant light. Feature an intricately knotted design supported by a ring frame with a dome that casts beams of light through your space.

name: Smoko Hot Dog Light
describe: Hot diggity dog, this little light by Smoko channels a kitschy-nostalgic feel.

name: Willow USB Desk Lamp
describe: Metal desk lamp with built-in USB port, perfect for shining a light on your workspace with sleekly cool style. Plugs in to power on with inline rotary switch and USB port to charge up your tech.

name: Priscilla Table Lamp
describe: Boho-femme table lamp that lends sweetly retro aesthetics to your nightstand. Fitted with a rattan base featuring curvy shaping, topped with an accordion-pleat tapered woven shade. Plugs in to power on; compact fluorescent compatible.

name: Salon Arc Floor Lamp
describe: The sleekest vibes with this arced floor lamp, featuring an extended bar with a curving silhouette, set on a round, flat base. Featuring a cylindrical woven shade for a diffused glow through your space.

name: Quinton Abstract Table Lamp
describe: Sleekly modern table lamp featuring a wood-look cylindrical shade propped on a graphic metal base. Featuring a tripod construction and angular silhouette. Plugs in to power on with a dimmable function and rotary switch. UL listed.

name: Macramé Pendant Light Shade
describe: Long macramé pendant light shade featuring interior ring support framing along the boho-inspired knotting. Trimmed with a fringed edge. Pair with a cord kit for hanging - sold separately.

name: Simon Adjustable Sconce
describe: Inspired by modern industrial design, this wall sconce features a powder-coated steel bar base with a sliding task-style light fixture. With a sliding height and articulated lamp, it's perfect for creating light wherever you need it. Recommended for use with LED bulb for maximum brightness.

name: Macramé Fringed Drum Pendant Light
describe: Set your space apart with this standout, boho-inspired macramé pendant light. Features a drum shade with intricate knotting flanked in long fringed trim along the bottom edge.

name: Mia Ceramic Table Lamp
describe: Boho-minimalism perfected with this table lamp, featuring a round, ceramic base in a natural terracotta finish, with a crisp woven angled shade. Plugs in to power on; compact fluorescent compatible.

name: Lucas Wood Sconece
describe: Vintage-inspired sconce, featuring a wooden wall bracket with concentric ridges, topped with a conical woven shade. Plugs in to power on.

name: Isobel Floor Lamp
describe: Light up your space with elegant whimsy when you display this twist-base floor lamp. Featuring a round base and twisting resin neck, topped with a woven drum shade. Plugs in to power on; compact fluorescent compatible.

name: Firefly String Lights
describe: Tiny firefly lights strung along a delicate copper wire - perfect for adding bright touch to any space, indoors or out. We love 'em for dorm decor, too! The LED bulbs are strung on a bendable wire with a water-resistant electrical adapter that is safe to use indoors or in a covered outdoor area.

name: Casey Floor Lamp
describe: Industrial-cool floor lamp in a metal build with a bisected neck and round base, with a spotlight shade that articulates to the perfect angle. Plugs in to power on with rotary switch.

name: Extra Long Copper Firefly String Lights
describe: Tiny firefly lights strung along a seriously long (98 feet!) delicate copper wire - perfect for adding bright touch to any space, indoors or out. We love 'em for dorm decor, too! The LED bulbs are strung on a bendable wire with a water-resistant electrical adapter that is safe to use indoors or in a covered outdoor area.

name: Covey Lantern Pendant Light
describe: Lantern pendant light with a modern profile, cut oblong and covered in a translucent silk that filters light through your space with a luminous, diffused glow. Hardwired; compact fluorescent compatible.

name: Wood Uplight Table Lamp
describe: Put your spin on this minimalist table lamp, featuring a round wooden base and metal cylindrical metal ring.

name: Mikko Bed
describe: Dream sweet on this boho-meets-modern bed frame. Features an iron base and wrapped rattan frame with curving edges at head and foot with linear accents, complete with a slatted base. Assembly required.

name: Amaia Bed
describe: Upholstered bed frame featuring a slub weave at headboard, footboard and sides for a crisp, inviting look. Wingback headboard wraps around edges. Propped on a wooden base. Assembly required.

name: Jacob Bed
describe: Modern-rustic bed frame handmade from maple wood with a beautiful grain and minimalist silhouette. Features a slatted headboard and base topping block legs, all showing off knots and mineral streaks of the natural wood. No box spring is needed.

name: Cecilia Bed
describe: Boho-femme, this wooden bed frame with floral kantha detailing will inspire free-spirited dreams. Weathered wooden frame features angular, tapered legs, slatted base and built-in headboard.

name: Canoga Rattan Bed
describe: Perfectly boho bed crafted from rattan in a versatile look we love. Complete with a slatted bed base, this piece is built to last with natural wood. Comes in standard twin and queen sizes. Mattress not included.

name: Akina Bed
describe: Simple platform bed frame from our Akina collection, made from mango wood with a rich, swirling grain and slatted base. Set on angled legs. Two people recommended for assembly.

name: Ivy Bed
describe: Turn your space into a sanctuary with this mango wood bed frame, featuring a headboard and footboard with woven rattan panels for a crisp, modern-boho aesthetic. Standing frame features a natural finish. Boxspring not required. 2 people recommended for assembly.

name: Sadie Platform Bed
describe: With a minimalist look and angular structure, the UO-exclusive Sadie Platform Bed is carved from sustainable tropical mahogany + sengon tekik wood. Complete with a sturdy slatted design so no box spring is needed! Mattress + bedding sold separately.

name: Evie Bed
describe: Wood bed frame with a classic, vintage-inspired look that will always feel like home. Featuring legs that taper in, framing a caged headboard with curved edges. Finished with a slatted base.

name: Bohemian Platform Bed
describe: Carved from sustainable mango wood, our UO-exclusive Bohemian Platform Bed adds an understated rustic touch. Complete with a sturdy slatted design so no box spring is needed! Mattress and bedding sold separately.

name: Wyatt Bed
describe: With a rustic-industrial look, this UO-exclusive mango wood bed frame features a raised construction. With solid panels that rest over a slatted base, featuring minimalist planks at headboard and footboard. 2 people recommended for assembly.

name: Rosalie Velvet Platform Bed
describe: Ultra-glam velvet platform bed frame, found exclusively at UO. Featuring minimalist framing with a lifted platform construction and straight headboard in a luxe, dimensional velvet with 4 removable, brushed metal legs.

name: Eva Wooden Canopy Bed
describe: The canopy bed you've always dreamed of in natural gmelina wood, only available right here at UO. In a sturdy slated construction so there's no need for a box spring with a rectangular structure built overhead for hanging an airy canopy, string lights or plants - let your imagination run wild.

name: Caroline Rattan Canopy Bed
describe: Fit for the boho room of your dreams, this canopy bed is crafted from rattan and mahogany wood in a natural finish, featuring caged paneling along standing base. Tall, four-poster design complete with caged top, perfect for winding through string lights or textiles. This custom furniture piece will be made to order just for you.

name: Amelia Platform Bed
describe: Simply rustic platform bed made from solid mango wood. Slatted base with a reinforced center to perfectly support your mattress. Some assembly required.

name: Andrea Carved Platform Bed
describe: Like a vintage find that makes your space so special, this UO-exclusive wooden platform bed frame adds a rustic storybook touch to your room. Carved from sustainable mango wood in a natural finish with decorative etching in a floral vintage-look pattern.

name: Kira Bed
describe: Sleek + lustrous, this bed frame is crafted from sustainable rubberwood with Okume veneer. Lifted bed frame featuring solid headboard + footboard in a natural finish with a slatted base.

name: Charlotte Velvet Tufted Wingback Bed
describe: Make your bedroom all the more insta-glammable with the velvet Charlotte bed frame featuring a vintage-inspired tufted headboard. In a cleanly lined design with a low bed and high back, finished with a durable hidden steel frame set on cylindrical black legs for a sleek finish.

name: Marcella Velvet Bed
describe: So chic we can’t even stand it, this UO-exclusive tufted velvet bed is straight out of our Parisian dreams. Featuring a headboard and frame covered in soft, dimensional velvet with tufted seaming and rounded edges.

name: Marte Platform Bed
describe: It’s vacation vibes all the time with this minimal rubberwood bedframe with a rattan inset headboard. Features rounded corners and a supportive slatted surface so no box spring mattress is needed!

name: Alder Bed
describe: A refined take on retro-chic, this oak wood bed features arched woven cane panels along the headboard and all-over panels at the footboard to give your space a modern interpretation of vintage appeal.

name: Ria Rattan Bed
describe: With a ‘70s-inspired boho look, this bed frame from our UO-exclusive Ria collection features a looped rattan construction with a graphic, linear design. In a natural finish with a curving silhouette featuring rounded corners at headboard and around framed base.

name: Symbology Bed Blanket
describe: Boho bed blanket, perfect for adding an extra-cozy layer to your slumbers. Features contrasting geometric prints at front and back with a brushed texture and piped edge.

name: Bomi Tufted Duvet Cover
describe: Geo tufted duvet cover featuring a tonal palette set on a soft, cotton weave. Equipped with soft cotton sheeting + hidden button closure at back to easily remove + toss in the wash. Duvet insert sold separately.

name: Greenery Duvet Set
describe: Coordinate your bedding with this duvet set in a leafy green pattern. Comes with a duvet cover, pillowcases and drawstring carrying pouch
